pages.text: $(bred)Edgar-090505$() is a robot created by Dr.Edgar, use $(bpurple)Zomboss Doll$() right click ground to summon it, $(bred)the summon place need be empty, even grass is not allowed.$()ã€‚

pages.title: Zomboss Doll
pages.text: Its recipe is related to Gargantuar's drop item.

$(bred)Edgar-090505$()'s most prominent attack is its $(byellow)ice and fire balls$(). $(baqua)Ice balls$() can only be destroyed by $(bred)jalapeno$(), and $(bred)fire balls$() can only be destroyed by cold $(baqua)ice shroom$(). In addition, it will summon almost $(l)all kinds of invading zombies$(), especially $(bred)bungee zombies$(), so please be careful.
